WorkItem.Description:
Visual Studio 2010 jsHint throw an "Error in jsHint...".
I've understood that the update path in file "C:\Users\[username]\AppData\Local\Microsoft\Windows\http___jshint.com_jshint.js" is wrong.
The corret path should be "http://www.jshint.com/src/js/jshint.js"

Is it possible to fix it?
I've got this error very often, at least one time a day.
Thanks in advance.
WorkItem.Summary: jsHint wrong update path, please fix ASAP

Comments.Message:
Test with last version (source code) or ver 2.03 (http://chirpy.codeplex.com/releases/view/78571).

Probably solve your problem.
